title: SLAM JAM'D
body_text:
SUMMER JAMBOREE Results:
DiBuccio vs. Oberto!
MATCH SUMMARY
The steaming-hot temperature was nothing compared to the indestructible line of fire constructed by leading lady DiBuccio. The iconic
ECDElitist
utilized her extensive wisdom and knowledge of the game and its participants to dismember the opposition.
Oberto did manage to snatch the inaugural round - a methodical, 55-minute melee - but was mercilessly shot down for the remainder of the multi-hour encounter.
Diana DiBuccio
defeated
Kelly Oberto
, 6 to 1.
MATCH ANALYSIS
Experience and power separated the rivaling squads.
DiBuccio put her trust in the longtime, heavy-hitters of years past like Zach Katz as well as brothers Chris and Kevin Adams. Tack on the clutch catches by Kevin Megill and the unpredictability of "Maniac" Mills and you've got one all-star line-up of 2005 legends.
As for the Oberto onslaught, two distinct, offensive trios were easily noticeable: Jason Teitelbaum, Justin Wolf, and Juan Londono; Kris Librizzi, Arthur Casbarro, and Kenny Jacobs.
INJURY REPORT
ECDElitist
John Tronolone has sought medical attention for his nagging right shoulder injury and will receive the results of his X-ray in the coming week. No other injuries have been reported from
SUMMER JAMBOREE
.
RECORDS
Attendance
: 23, comprised of 15 men and 8 women
New Players
: 2 - Ela Odaci, Sarah Hoffman
Game Rules
: Classic two-team.
Featured Match
: Diana DiBuccio defeated Kelly Oberto, 6 - 1.
Game-By-Game Results
: DiBuccio 2-7; Oberto 1
Captains Records
: DiBuccio 5-4-4; Oberto 0-1-0
→ DiBuccio competed in her 10th singles contest which is most among female competitors and tied for second all-time along with Chris Adams.
→ Oberto became the 81st recorded captain.
Musical Playlist
: Chris Adams
________________________________________
____________________________
August and September: A Double Main Event!
STAR WARS: August 13, 2011
It must be that time of the year .. six of the greatest ever in one barbaric battle to settle it all! You can call this the "Fame Ball" when
Chris Adams
,
Lauren Winston
, and
Michael Edwards
clash with
Justin Pierce
,
Valerie Winston
, and
Kevin Fitzpatrick
on August 13. Check back in the coming week for the incredible story surrounding this one.
SIX YEAR ANNIVERSARY: September 10, 2011
And then, the grandest celebration of the entire year when
East Coast Dodgeball
blows out its 6th birthday candle. In the night's colossal main event,
Zach Katz
takes on
Justin Wolf
in this "animalistic" war of wars. Plus, find out who will be the newest member of the prestigious
ECDElite
Hall of Fame with a special on-court induction ceremony.
Both of these monumental extravaganzas begin at 5pm, live from the Wall High School tennis courts. Do not miss out!
body_html:
SUMMER JAMBOREE Results:
DiBuccio vs. Oberto!

MATCH SUMMARY
The steaming-hot temperature was nothing compared to the indestructible line of fire constructed by leading lady DiBuccio. The iconic ECDElitist utilized her extensive wisdom and knowledge of the game and its participants to dismember the opposition.

Oberto did manage to snatch the inaugural round - a methodical, 55-minute melee - but was mercilessly shot down for the remainder of the multi-hour encounter.

Diana DiBuccio defeated Kelly Oberto, 6 to 1.

MATCH ANALYSIS
Experience and power separated the rivaling squads.

DiBuccio put her trust in the longtime, heavy-hitters of years past like Zach Katz as well as brothers Chris and Kevin Adams. Tack on the clutch catches by Kevin Megill and the unpredictability of "Maniac" Mills and you've got one all-star line-up of 2005 legends.

As for the Oberto onslaught, two distinct, offensive trios were easily noticeable: Jason Teitelbaum, Justin Wolf, and Juan Londono; Kris Librizzi, Arthur Casbarro, and Kenny Jacobs.

INJURY REPORT
ECDElitist John Tronolone has sought medical attention for his nagging right shoulder injury and will receive the results of his X-ray in the coming week. No other injuries have been reported from SUMMER JAMBOREE.

RECORDS
Attendance: 23, comprised of 15 men and 8 women
New Players: 2 - Ela Odaci, Sarah Hoffman

Game Rules: Classic two-team.
Featured Match: Diana DiBuccio defeated Kelly Oberto, 6 - 1.
Game-By-Game Results: DiBuccio 2-7; Oberto 1
Captains Records: DiBuccio 5-4-4; Oberto 0-1-0
→ DiBuccio competed in her 10th singles contest which is most among female competitors and tied for second all-time along with Chris Adams.
→ Oberto became the 81st recorded captain.

Musical Playlist: Chris Adams

____________________________________________________________________


August and September: A Double Main Event!

STAR WARS: August 13, 2011
It must be that time of the year .. six of the greatest ever in one barbaric battle to settle it all! You can call this the "Fame Ball" when Chris Adams, Lauren Winston, and Michael Edwards clash with Justin Pierce, Valerie Winston, and Kevin Fitzpatrick on August 13. Check back in the coming week for the incredible story surrounding this one.

SIX YEAR ANNIVERSARY: September 10, 2011
And then, the grandest celebration of the entire year when East Coast Dodgeball blows out its 6th birthday candle. In the night's colossal main event, Zach Katz takes on Justin Wolf in this "animalistic" war of wars. Plus, find out who will be the newest member of the prestigious ECDElite Hall of Fame with a special on-court induction ceremony.

Both of these monumental extravaganzas begin at 5pm, live from the Wall High School tennis courts. Do not miss out!
